interactivity.requirements: 30 Maya Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " What it Means to Be Destroyed " from Maya Makinami Seen " Walking on Air " from Ami Arakawa
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Choose "Touching you" in No One Can See Us . Visit the Shrine after seeing What it Means to Be Destroyed and reaching 30 Affection with Maya.
interactivity.to_miss_this_event: Choose "..." in No One Can See Us . Replaced by Breaking, the Best Way after seeing What it Means to Be Destroyed .

trivia: Dialogue varies if A Place That Can Only Exist in Our Minds has been seen.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .15p1.
